raw: Live updates: Trump suspends travel from Europe to U.S. due to coronavirus; pushes for economic measures .

raw: BEIJING — Wuhan , the epicenter of China ’s coronavirus epidemic , is making plan to reopen its main airport in late March , indicating a tentative lifting of quarantine as new infections in the city continue to fall .

raw: Wuhan Tianhe International Airport was one of China ’s biggest air terminals in terms of passenger traffic until it was closed due to virus in late January , when the city quarantined its 11 million residents in a lockdown of unprecedented scale .
replaced: The airport was one of China ’s biggest air terminals in terms of passenger traffic until The airport was closed due to virus in late January , when Wuhan quarantined Wuhan 11 million residents in a lockdown of unprecedented scale .

raw: The travel ban is expected to end , however , with the number of new confirmed cases in Wuhan having fallen to single digits for the first time in over a month .

raw: “ We have been making preparations for a tentative reopening of the airport later this month , somewhere after March 20 , ” a senior airport manager told The Washington Post on Thursday , declining to give his name because he was n’t permitted to speak publicly .
